dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1400 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify that children of certain veterans are eligible for the Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry scholarship.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify that children of certain veterans are eligible for the Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry scholarship.

section.header: Clarification of Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry Scholarship

subsection.text: Section 3311(b)(9) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking in line of duty and all that follows through the period and inserting as a result of a service-connected disability..
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as if included in the enactment of section 1002 of the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2009 (Public Law 111–32; 123 Stat. 1889).
